attributes.action: Implement in full the recommendations of the Culture Media and Sport Committe's Football Governance report
attributes.additional_details: We support the recommendations of the Culture Media and Sport Committe report into football governance dated January 29th 2013 (http://www.publications.parliament.uk/pa/cm201213/cmselect/cmcumeds/509/509.pdf) and request that these be immediately implemented in full with new legislation where required.
